original_title: The Mentors: A Piece of Sinema
overview: The Mentors short "Fuck Movie" where El Duce plays a couch test caster up to typical Mentors practice of "peaceful rape" as well as showing where inspirations for "Goin' Thru Your Purse", "Sleep Bandits" & "On The Rag" come from. The Mentors short "Get Up & Die" about killing New Wavers and Glam Rockers. The Mentors on Hot Seat with Wally George. Conversation with El Duce & The Mentors.
title: The Mentors: A Piece of Sinema
